text: Ni shuo:“You jing ren a! Nimen bu hui you hao jieguo, chufei nimen zunxing “tao la te” he “yin ji lei”, yiji [xianzai] cong nimen de zhu jiang shi nimen de jingdian [“gulanjing”].” Cong ni de zhu jiang shi ni de [jingdian] biding hui zengzhang tamen zhong xuduo ren de panni he bu xin, suo yi, ni buyao wei bu xinyang de minzhong beishang.
